title: Top Floor 2 Bed / 2 Bath Penthouse Loft Apt! Close to UCLA!
posting_body: ['Top Floor 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath Penthouse Loft Apartment Close To UCLA.', '972 Hilgard Avenue', 'Westwood, Los Angeles, California, 90024', 'Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills', '2 bedroom apartment offers the following amenities:', 'Carpeted Floors', 'Tile Kitchen and Bathroom Floors', 'Private Balcony or Patio', 'Cozy Gas Fireplace', 'Refrigerator', 'Spectacular Views Available', 'Loft', 'Microwave', 'Central Air and Heating', 'Dishwasher', 'Extra Storage', 'Stove', 'Mirrored Closet Doors', 'Controlled Access', 'Roof Terrace', 'BBQ/Grill Area', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Garage Parking', "Spacious top floor 2 bedroom penthouse loft apartment, we're walking distance of everything in Westwood Village, just two blocks north of Wilshire and one block east of Westwood Boulevard, close to UCLA.", 'This apartment features spacious living areas perfect for entertaining, a breakfast bar, great views, a balcony, a gas fireplace, air conditioning, and more!', ' Kitchen is equipped with a stove, a refrigerator, a microwave and a dishwasher.', 'The Hilgard is a coveted apartment community located in Westwood, Los Angeles.', 'We offer desirable Studio, 1 and 2 bedroom floor plans with select townhome style units designed with your needs in mind.', 'Nestled North of Wilshire Blvd., you are in close proximity to UCLA, UCLA Medical Center, and Century City.', 'Treat yourself to everyday conveniences immediately outside your front door like Whole Foods, Ralphs, Target, Trader Joe’s, and the weekly Farmers Market.', 'For more information, call us today at', 'show contact info', 'or visit <URL>.', 'Disclaimer: Pictures are a representation but may not be of the exact apartment.', 'Advertised unit availability, rental rates, and terms are updated every 24 hours and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Please call for latest availability details.']
